AddPermission.name: AddPermission
AddPermission.description: Grants permission to a queue for a specific principal

CancelMessageMoveTask.name: CancelMessageMoveTask
CancelMessageMoveTask.description: Grants permission to cancel an in progress message move task

ChangeMessageVisibility.name: ChangeMessageVisibility
ChangeMessageVisibility.description: Grants permission to change the visibility timeout of a specified message in a queue to a new value

CreateQueue.name: CreateQueue
CreateQueue.description: Grants permission to create a new queue, or returns the URL of an existing one

DeleteMessage.name: DeleteMessage
DeleteMessage.description: Grants permission to delete the specified message from the specified queue

DeleteQueue.name: DeleteQueue
DeleteQueue.description: Grants permission to delete the queue specified by the queue URL, regardless of whether the queue is empty

GetQueueAttributes.name: GetQueueAttributes
GetQueueAttributes.description: Grants permission to get attributes for the specified queue

GetQueueUrl.name: GetQueueUrl
GetQueueUrl.description: Grants permission to return the URL of an existing queue

ListDeadLetterSourceQueues.name: ListDeadLetterSourceQueues
ListDeadLetterSourceQueues.description: Grants permission to return a list of your queues that have the RedrivePolicy queue attribute configured with a dead letter queue

ListMessageMoveTasks.name: ListMessageMoveTasks
ListMessageMoveTasks.description: Grants permission to list message move tasks

ListQueueTags.name: ListQueueTags
ListQueueTags.description: Grants permission to list tags added to an SQS queue

ListQueues.name: ListQueues
ListQueues.description: Grants permission to return a list of your queues

PurgeQueue.name: PurgeQueue
PurgeQueue.description: Grants permission to delete the messages in a queue specified by the queue URL

ReceiveMessage.name: ReceiveMessage
ReceiveMessage.description: Grants permission to retrieve one or more messages, with a maximum limit of 10 messages, from the specified queue

RemovePermission.name: RemovePermission
RemovePermission.description: Grants permission to revoke any permissions in the queue policy that matches the specified Label parameter

SendMessage.name: SendMessage
SendMessage.description: Grants permission to deliver a message to the specified queue

SetQueueAttributes.name: SetQueueAttributes
SetQueueAttributes.description: Grants permission to set the value of one or more queue attributes

StartMessageMoveTask.name: StartMessageMoveTask
StartMessageMoveTask.description: Grants permission to start a message move task

TagQueue.name: TagQueue
TagQueue.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified SQS queue

UntagQueue.name: UntagQueue
UntagQueue.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified SQS queue
